column4: Hi, i am wondering if anyone has heard of some load smoothing tool for a home network. I will describe this the best i can: my sis likes to play an online game, warcraft 3. It does not take very much bandwidth but it is sensitive to ping. I have a web server which is connected to the modem directly with all the other network devices bridged behind it. (ubuntu server 11.10 on it)
you should run it on the router or gw device that controls traffic in and out
